main event: Observers reported a round object, white and/or silver, resembling a partially filled plastic bag in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 6 December 1957,The object was observed visually and described as having the appearance of a partially filled plastic bag,The course of the object was from northeast to southwest,Two Air Force jets were scrambled but there was no detection of the object, There were 12 civilian witnesses from a Dupont patrol and military personnel involved.
sighted object: a round white and/or silver object
witness description: civilian and military personnel including members of Dupont patrol
